supporterForm.title: Supporter
supporterForm.infoBox: Your name, age and place of residence are sometimes required to register you for activities (like some festivals). We would like to select the supporter for concerts and festivals fairly, thus we try to distribute the slots balanced between different genders. Additionally, your mobile phone will be used for quick clarification before an action.

info.token: Redirect follows soon. Please contact us via email, if an error occurs.

finish.title: You're almost done!
finish.description: You are the Drop! We've send you an e-mail with instructions to complete your SignUp!

password.empty: You have not entered any password

email.empty: You have not entered any email address
email.unequal: Both email addresses are not equal.

unAuthorized.title: Unauthorized
unAuthorized.msg: You are not allowed to register yourself. Please send us an email to alert us about this problem.

serverError.title: Internal error
serverError.msg: An internal error occurred. Please send us an email to alert us about this problem.

badRequest.title: Problem with your data
badRequest.msg: Your data has issued an error. Please send us an email to alert us about this problem.

signin.title: Login
signin.description: Please enter your, account data to Sign In.

sublabel.types: Die katze rennt um den grünen großen Baum

alert.title: e-mail was sent
alert.description: You will receive the e-mail in the next few minutes. Please hold the line ;-)

PasswordInstructions.title: you forgot your password?
PasswordInstructions.description: no problem, just enter here your e-mail adress and we will send you the instructions per mail to reset it.

PasswordInstructionsPool1.title: please reset your password!
PasswordInstructionsPool1.description: we've noticed this is your first login to the new Pool. Please enter your e-mail address and we will send you the instructuins per mail to set a new one.

Password.title: reset your password
Password.description: To protect your account, please use a secure password.

thingstoinclude.title: Things to include:
thingstoinclude.2: •One or more of each of the following: lower-case letter, upper-case letter, number, special charakter

thingstoavoid.title: Things to avoid:
thingstoavoid.1: •Words you can find in the dictionary.
thingstoavoid.2: •Keyboard patterns, like qwerty or 12345. Particularly avoid sequences of numbers in order
thingstoavoid.3: •The same password you use for another application.

PasswordDone.title: all set up!
PasswordDone.description: You will be redirected to the sign in page in a few seconds... Or click

changePassword.title: Change your Password
changePassword.description: To set a new Password, please fill in your old Password.

changeEMail.title: Change your e-mail address
changeEMail.description: To change your e-mail address, please fill in your old e-Mail address

message.401: You have to be logged in to visit this page.
message.403: You have no permission to access this page.
